Deleting this is fine, commit 8a3c4869a9416ee16cf441dd3babf85de6c9d73f has been applied to our svn trunk, Thanks for taking care of this.
It looks like this has been applied to our svn head and can be safely deleted.
The `.harray` selector is implemented and documented at https://sling.apache.org/documentation/bundles/rendering-content-default-get-servlets.html so I think this can be safely deleted.
@ieb - there are some merge conflicts, I think I already committed some of the changes. Can you rebase and resubmit?

I think that since it's a sample it's better to use the latest releases if possible.
Will try with releases and update the pr

closing to address a missed unit test
